headline: PulteGroup Earns 2025 Great Place To Work Certification™
summary: ATLANTA, August 08, 2025--PulteGroup, Inc. (NYSE: PHM), America's third-largest homebuilding company, is proud to be Certified™ by Great Place To Work® for the seventh time. The prestigious award is based entirely on what current employees say about their experience working at PulteGroup. This year, 93% of employees said it’s a Great Place To Work compared to 57% of employees at a typical U.S. company.
